org.w3c.tidy

Class TidyMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.w3c.tidy.TidyMessage

  • public final class TidyMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Message sent to listeners for validation errors/warnings and info.
    Version:
    $Revision: 630 $ ($Author: fgiust $)
    Author:
    Fabrizio Giustina
    See Also:
    Tidy.setMessageListener(TidyMessageListener)

        errorCode - Tidy internal error code.

        level - severity
        message - message text
